title: Easy-Bake Battle: The Home Cooking Competition
overview: Life is complicated, but cooking doesn't have to be! Enter Easy-Bake Battle, a new culinary competition series inspired by Hasbro's iconic Easy-Bake Oven, featuring skilled and ultra clever home cooks, all with a ton of heart and soul, facing off and using their most ingenious kitchen hacks to prove who can make the easiest, fastest, and most delicious food.
